name: CubePlatformer - My First Game
description:
Not gonna put too much effort into making a good site for this game. But it is a little project that I had been working on almost two years ago. I was able to dig it up, this was what actually inspired Very Impressive Parkour Game. When I said, "Who doesn't love a flashback to an old game", I meant this game. 

The refrence in Very Impressive Parkour Game

Then I realized no one had any reference. So if you are interested, download it.

Be warned: 

The game is unpolished AF and you have to ALT+F4 to close it. It also doesn't save progress, but it only has 7 levels. TBH I spent more time making the logo than the game itself.
